song_lyrics: Sakhī dalmā lāgyā dāye, prajavalu hu prītmā... 1
Sakhī nathī ugaravā jāgya, āj āvī banī... 2
Sakhī vaṇmāge vaḷī mot, āj māre āvīyu;
Sakhī marashu dāze sot, kene na jāy kahyu... 3
Sakhīhayurahe kem hāth, vīpat keṭalī veṭhshu;
Sakhī Niṣhkuḷānandno Nāth, male dukh meṭashu... 4
title: Sakhī Māgasare manmāye chitavaṇi chitmā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1194: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
